title: Katie Price calls police on ex Charles Drury: claims he stole
text:
Katie Price, 41, has called the police on her former flame Charles Drury, 22, amid claims he stole from her and hacked her phone during their brief romance.

Insiders claimed to MailOnline: 'He went through her phone and stole from her. Katie's gone to police as he's threatening to leak information. She feels betrayed and shocked - she had no choice but to get police involved. They are investigating.'

The duo met earlier this year when Katie was reportedly still with her ex Kris Boyson, 30, leading to heartache however things have now ended in a bitter storm.

Hurt: Kate Price, 41, has called the police on her former flame Charles Drury, 22, amid claims he stole from her and hacked her phone during their brief romance

Katie has been hit with strife of late due to financial woes, her torrid love life and now her issues with her former flame, who has allegedly hacked her phone.

She is said to be devastated by the allegations of Charles' betrayal and is determined to fight for justice following his threats of leaking information from her phone.

MailOnline has contacted Katie's representative, West Sussex Police and Charles' modelling agency for comment.

It was reported earlier this year that Kris was left humiliated after Katie dumped him by text in August to pursue a romance with Charles.

Shocker: Insiders revealed to MailOnline, she said: 'He went through her phone and stole from her. Katie's gone to police as he's threatening to leak information'

This comes after Kris slammed the reality star for claiming all her exes rely on her to make money. The Loose Women presenter badmouthed her previous partners for 'trying to be famous' and 'becoming Mr Prices' off the back of her success.

But personal trainer Kris, 30, lashed out at Katie's comments, warning: 'Don’t test me mate! I’d never become a Mr Price, thanks. I’ll always be a Boyson!'

In a new clip from her YouTube channel, Katie said: 'I wanted to do this test on looking at my exes – who they were before they met me and what they did to now they’re not with me and the difference of their life.

'They’ve become Mr Prices, try be famous, end up getting Instagram posts on the back of me, getting all jobs and being able to earn money from stories and that but always mentioning my name…'

Hurtful comments: The duo met earlier this year when Katie was reportedly still with her ex Kris Boyson, 30, leading to heartache however things have now ended in a bitter storm (pictured together in July)

Kris, who’s reportedly back with Katie despite her playing away with Charles, insists he’s never sold a story and hasn’t done any paid-for Instagram posts as a result of his romance with the model.

He added: 'I'm a respectful gentleman! I do the same job I've done since before I met ya. I done TV before I met ya.

'I ain’t done paid Instagram posts. I ain’t sold stories, ain’t tried becoming a model and I’d never become a Mr Price.' (sic)

Katie has son Harvey, 17, with ex-footballer Dwight Yorke, 47, son Junior, 14, and daughter Princess Tiaamii, 12, with ex-husband Peter Andre and son Jett, six, and daughter Bunny, five, with Kieran.
